magnatar krogalt~1~commander~38~sith marauder~Yes~human~odesson~dual-wield lightsaber~infinite alliance~neutral~commander of the infinite alliance~as sith during the old days of the sith empire he quickly rose through the ranks before being betryaed by his former master, after surviving and being recruited by 2 sith calling themselves "the emperor's hands" he became the wrath and sought revenge against he who betrayed him.
years after the happenings he was asked by darth marr to aid him in a battle against an unseen enemy. through years of conquest, compromise, alliances, betrayals, losses and gains he rose to the position of commander and after the defeat of the infinite empire assumed control of their resources.
